kima#ShTaqmEnEtyaqShTAkSha#rAM gAyaqtrImitiq kiM na#vaqmEnEti# triqvRutaq(gg)q stOmaqmitiq kiM da#SaqmEnEtiq daSA$kSharAM ~MviqrAjaqmitiq kimE#kAdaqSEnEtyEkA#daSAkSharAM triqShTuBaqmitiq kiM dvA#daqSEnEtiq dvAda#SAkSharAqM jaga#tIqmityEqtAvaqdvA a#stiq yAva#dEqtad-yAva#dEqvAstiq tadE#ShAM ~MvRu~gktE || 6
(Sakva#rIqmityE - ka#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A2)
